SEARCH
Module LAB_03
Package ki304.salahub.Lab3

Class Dimensions

java.lang.Object
ki304.salahub.Lab3.Dimensions
public class Dimensions extends Object
The Dimensions class represents the physical dimensions and attributes of a scanner, including length, width, height, brand, handle presence, and color scanning support.

It provides methods to get and set each dimension and attribute and includes default values in the default constructor.

Example usage:

 
   // Create an instance of Dimensions with default values
   Dimensions defaultDimensions = new Dimensions();

   // Create an instance of Dimensions with specified parameters
   Dimensions customDimensions = new Dimensions(60.0, 30.0, 15.0, "Epson", true, false);

   // Get and set individual dimensions and attributes
   double length = customDimensions.getLength();
   customDimensions.setBrand("HP");
Since:
